records.uncertainty_note: Specific location details are redacted, only country is known. Incident involved a scooter.
records.context_note: Along with other Frontex members, Text Removed - Justification 2 was riding a rented scooter to view the Text Removed - Justification 4 emergency port. In a sharp road turn, the scooter ran over some loose stones, causing it to slip and overturned. In the accident, he injured his left arm, his legs and his big toe. Worst injury was his arm that received an open wound. The injured Frontex member were taken by other Frontex members to the local doctor/infirmary Text Removed - Justification 4, where his wounds were cleaned and the wound on his arm sewed with 20-22 stitches. It is expected that the injuries will not cause long-term or lasting damage. The vehicle sustained only minor material damage. The compensation for this has been clarified with the owner of the scooter.
records.evidence_quote: Along with other Frontex members, Text Removed - Justification 2 was riding a rented scooter to view the Text Removed - Justification 4 emergency port. In a sharp road turn, the scooter ran over some loose stones, causing it to slip and overturned.

records.context_note: Walking on the street in Mytilini, on 18.06.2020 afternoon, Text Removed - Justification 2 twisted the ankle in a small hole. She had an appointment immediately with the doctor and the doctor prescribed crutches for 4 days. It is just a little injury and normally she could walk normally on Monday, 22.06. She will have another appointment on Monday afternoon just to make a second medical check. The doctor prescribed crutches for 4 days.
records.evidence_quote: Walking on the street in Mytilini, on 18.06.2020 afternoon, Text Removed - Justification 2 twisted the ankle in a small hole.

records.uncertainty_note: Specific location details are redacted, only country is known. Incident occurred on board a vessel.
records.context_note: An accident happened on 10 May in the afternoon on board of Text Removed - Justification 6- involving Text Removed - Justification 2. During maintenance activity of the vessel the officer fell down and injured his leg. At the beginning it didn't appear as a serious accident. The day after (on 11 May) the officer was examined Text Removed - Justification 3,4 and the result of X-Ray was Tibia fissure.
records.evidence_quote: An accident happened on 10 May in the afternoon on board of Text Removed - Justification 6- involving Text Removed - Justification 2. During maintenance activity of the vessel the officer fell down and injured his leg.

records.context_note: During the night fires broke out in the offices of the Asylum Service, as well as in the canteen of RIC VIAL. Two cars were also set on fire, while the refugees were engaged in a stone fight with HP. The riots actually broke out as reaction of the death of a 47 year old IRN woman. Moreover several tents and containers outside the main building, but also inside the main building, where all the organisations and agencies are located, were damaged and destroyed. Minor damages for the Frontex containers. Nothing observed missing from the containers.
records.evidence_quote: During the night fires broke out in the offices of the Asylum Service, as well as in the canteen of RIC VIAL. Two cars were also set on fire, while the refugees were engaged in a stone fight with HP.

records.context_note: Today, at about 19:45 hours, after the registration process in the Vial camp was over, 2 Team Members (Text Removed - Justification 2) were involved in an incident, allegedly with locals. After attempting to leave the camp through the normal access, they had to return back due to demonstrations. During their second attempt to leave the area, in the surroundings of the camp, crowd intercepted their vehicle and started damaging the rental car (at least both mirrors are broken). After this incident, they managed to turn the car around and return back to Vial camp, were they remain to this point. None of the officers reported to suffer from any physical harm, yet they are affected by the incident.
records.evidence_quote: During their second attempt to leave the area, in the surroundings of the camp, crowd intercepted their vehicle and started damaging the rental car (at least both mirrors are broken).
